Detailed Description

SocketHandler is the execution context local control instance of sockets. Each execution context using sockets has to create an instance of SocketHandler.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

SocketHandler::SocketHandler (   ) 
 

SocketHandler::~SocketHandler (   )  [virtual]
 

Member Function Documentation

void SocketHandler::Init (   ) 
 

Initialize SocketHandler - sockets wont work for execution context unless SocketHandler has been initialized.

void SocketHandler::Release (   ) 
 

Free resources allocated by prior Init call. Free must be invoked before the SocketHandler gets destroyed.
